description:
The Volume Network is a cryptocurrency jointly built by the former co-founder and CTO of TRON.network and Lambda’s core team. The aim of VOL is to create large-scale commercial applications for global use cases.
Volume Network is a blockchain project that is dedicated to building a highly scalable and easy to use a cryptocurrency that can serve for large commercial transactions.

VOL is the basic currency of the Volume Network blockchain and it's mined through a consensus algorithm known as the Proof of Time and Space (PoST) algorithm via a computer hard disk mining system.
name: Volume Network
